creator: Safaricom Limited
descriptionHtml:
MySafaricom provides an easy and efficient way for customers to access Safaricom products and services under one roof. The app is available on both iOS and Android

With the MySafaricom App you can:

M-PESA SEND MONEY- Select your contacts directly from your phone book, Hakikisha the name of the person you are transferring money to & check the transaction charges before hitting the send button.

LIPA NA M-PESA – Shop and pay your bills with ease at your favorite stores

TOP-UP - Recharge your number and your loved ones by selecting their number directly from your phone book.

VIEW BALANCES - View your account balances for Data, Bonga, Airtime or Credit limit

HOME FIBRE - Safaricom Home Fibre customers will be able to pay or change their Home Fibre plans
descriptionShort: MySafaricom provides easy access to Safaricom products and services.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Loans and Savings - KCB/M-PESA and M-SHWARI
- Sambaza - Data and Airtime
- Receive your one time password (OTP) over Wi-Fi
- Minor bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
*** MAJOR UPDATE ***

It's time to AppYourGame with this fresh new update!

We update the MySafaricom app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve app performance and transaction performance.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

Love the app! Rate us! Your feedback keeps us building more great things FOR YOU.
Have any questions? Reach out to our customer care.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Due to necessary changes, you will need to log back into the MySafaricom app.
This update provides a couple of new features and enhancements:
- Access to M-PESA Global services. (Send to mobile, Western Union and Paypal).
- We have added Usage reports for Data and Airtime and Mobile Data saving tips.
- You can as well access Tunukiwa Bundles.
- We have also added Data Manager and Data Save to manage your data and save your airtime while browsing.
- Few Bug fixes

descriptionShort: MySafaricom provides easy access to Safaricom products and services.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: 🎉 This update provides a couple of enhancements and bug fixes.

title: MySafaricom

creator: Safaricom Limited
descriptionHtml:
MySafaricom provides an easy and efficient way for customers to access Safaricom products and services under one roof. The app is available on both iOS and Android

With the MySafaricom App you can:
